TopicTitle: Can't do science expirments any more, Help!

Articles.Content: I have installed B9 areospace, infurnal robotics, kerbal alarm clock, kerbal engineer, mechjeb2, near future propulsion and KAS. When I played my science mode,I couldn't log any science data at all! (But, the system say that I needed to download the latest versions of KAS and Kerbal engineer, does this have something to do with it?)

I've been having the same issue, with the same mods (and far more besides) installed.

Are you getting reports of e.g. "[R&D]: No Experiment definition found with id crewReport" in your log?
I was just about to ask the same question, I've been having problems with science too. I have no idea what is going on.
FWIW I solved my problem by deleting and reinstalling Kerbalism.
